Name: Red Zirion
About the game: Red Zirion is a retro shooting game with upgradeable attributes in the roguelike style. Help the team of space mercenaries Red Zirion to find and destroy the threat from the Cyber Brain Mentor. Game inspired by groups of heroes and animated series from the 80s. Red Zirion Features: Random Levels Unlockable characters Play with a friend in coop mode Letters are weapons, weapons from A to Z Wall jump works like a dodge Interesting and difficult bosses for you win
